title: I NEED 1 RP!!!!
body: Ok so let me explain. I main twitch. I love Sly Cooper. Riot has an amazing creative team, designed the coolest skin in existence and this happened!

replies.body:
Send a ticket to Riot with some fan art. Remember to be really nice! 
They are usually happy to help with such small amounts of rp. :D
LOL that's sucks. Many people have been there before.
muahahahhaaha tell them please help you only 1 rp must help riot xD
Send a Support Ticket to Ritooooooo!
they sell 1rp in the store for $5, and you get 599RP for free with it
Ask Riot they are very nice in these things but you can only do it once or twice
